name: Parisa Flighter
description:
***Android only***

In Parisa Flighter you play as a Parisa; a small creature who jumps on birds to fight his way up into the sky. Tilt and tap your way up into the sky to score high!

This was my first attempt at making a mobile game. This project was made during the second semester of my game design course and our assignment was to create a mobile game with a strong emphasis on game feel.  I had plans of a small rogue-like system like Downwell, more core mechanics, selective skill based collectibles and dedicated stages. Scope obviously didn't allow for all that but I had ambitions.

Controls:

Tilt: Move Left/Right | Tap: Flutter (Can be done 3 times before landing on a bird)
